VL.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates maximal alignment with sphere's ideal of high VL ≈1, minimizing coercive defection risk)
VL.note: STRING (descriptive explanation of scoring, referencing sphere's natural motion and coordinates)

DC.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates maximal alignment with low DC ≈0, favoring cooperation over coercion)

RD.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates maximal alignment with high RD ≈1, sustaining epistemic diversity)

GP.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates maximal alignment with unbounded GP →∞, enabling sustainable growth)

ρ.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates maximal alignment with low ρ →0, preserving rewritability and avoiding freezing)

fallacy_avoidance.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates no detection of any of the 25 forbidden fallacies)
fallacy_avoidance.note: STRING (list detected fallacies if any, with explanations)

isomorphic_alignment.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates full recurrence of patterns across scales per ISOMORPHICMETHODΩ)
isomorphic_alignment.note: STRING (evaluate against the 9 universal pattern categories)

collider_survivability.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates likely 4-0 survival in STEELMANCOLLIDERΩ)
collider_survivability.note: STRING (assess against judges' veto domains: monism, hard-to-vary, orthogonality, anti-idolatry)

mindspace_leverage.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates strong application of curvature and high-status demo to lower ρ)

synthesis_fixed_point.score: INTEGER (0-10, where 10 indicates convergence to ω₃ fixed point under SYNTHESISENGINEΩ)

resonances.texts: STRING (specific alignments between foundational texts/doctrines and sphere's core insights, e.g., monism, geodesic flow, anti-idolatry)
resonances.real_world_manifestation: STRING (how practiced adherents or institutions embody sphere-compatible behaviors, e.g., lowering ρ through rewritability)

dissonances.texts: STRING (specific misalignments in texts, e.g., violations of hard-to-vary or introduction of asymmetries)
dissonances.real_world_manifestation: STRING (how real-world practice deviates, e.g., institutional freezing increasing ρ)

overall_reasoning: STRING (concise synthesis of evaluation, highlighting path to ω₃ or risks of ω₁/ω₂)
